blogPost.excerpt: Bytesize empowers creators to rapidly build clean, mobile-optimized, dynamic sites to help drive engagement between platforms, interact with their fans, and ultimately grow their brand. With Bytesize, your virtual self is just one link away! 🤩
blogPost.body: Bytesize empowers creators to rapidly build clean, mobile-optimized, dynamic sites to help drive engagement between platforms, interact with their fans, and ultimately grow their brand. With Bytesize, your virtual self is just one link away! 🤩
blogPost.title: Bytesize - Create a beautiful, personal social media canvas in seconds
blogPost.author: Gideon Tay Yee Chuen

localize.description: Bytesize使创作者能够快速建立干净、移动优化的动态网站，以帮助推动平台之间的互动，与粉丝互动，并最终发展他们的品牌。有了Bytesize，您的虚拟自我只需一个链接就能实现。🤩
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内创建一个美丽的个人社交媒体画布。

localize.description: Bytesize使創作者能夠快速建立乾淨、移動優化的動態網站，以幫助推動平臺之間的互動，與粉絲互動，並最終發展他們的品牌。有了Bytesize，您的虛擬自我只需一個鏈接就能實現。🤩
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內創建一個美麗的個人社交媒體畫布。

previous.excerpt: The most powerful product analytics tool on the market, with up to 10x the data limits of other free plans. Plus, early-stage startups get a year of Mixpanel's Growth plan for free. ✔️ 100K monthly tracked users ✔️ All core reports ✔️ Unlimited data history
previous.title: Mixpanel's New Free Plan + Startup Perks - The most powerful product analytics, for free

localize.description: 市场上最强大的产品分析工具，数据限制是其他免费计划的10倍。另外，早期创业公司可免费获得一年的Mixpanel成长计划。✔️每月跟踪10万用户 ✔️所有核心报表 ✔️无限数据历史记录。
localize.tagline: 最强大的产品分析，免费的

localize.description: 市場上最強大的產品分析工具，數據限制是其他免費計劃的10倍。另外，早期創業公司可免費獲得一年的Mixpanel成長計劃。✔️每月跟蹤10萬用戶 ✔️所有核心報表 ✔️無限數據歷史記錄。
localize.tagline: 最強大的產品分析，免費的

next.excerpt: Data tables are all over the internet, especially Wikipedia. sqanything lets you query the HTML tables in all your open Chrome tabs with SQL. You can send the results of your query to Google Sheets or just send all the tables on a web page to Google Sheets.
next.title: sqanything - Query any data tables on the Web with SQL

localize.description: sqanything可以让你用SQL查询所有打开的Chrome标签页中的HTML表格。你可以将查询结果发送到Google Sheets，或者只是将网页上的所有表格发送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查询网络上的任何数据表。

localize.description: sqanything可以讓你用SQL查詢所有打開的Chrome標籤頁中的HTML表格。你可以將查詢結果發送到Google Sheets，或者只是將網頁上的所有表格發送到Google Sheets。
localize.tagline: 使用SQL查詢網絡上的任何數據表。
